title: CAN WE HAVE SOME QUIN NERFS PLEASE
body:
No one plays quin adc anymore people just spam her toplane, get fed and roam around with her ult killing everyone shes sees. I've had multiple quins ADMIT shes unfair. I think her passive and ult needs to be nerfed -  lower scaling on passive (I've seen her do more then half of an opponents health in dmg with it) and lower movement speed and increase mana cost on her ult (She has too much mobility with it allowing her to outrun most other champions). Quin shouldn't be allowed to have as much roam as she has (1000+ movement speed from base) especially when she can ult, rush onto an opponent, jump on them/slow them then deal ridiculous passive dmg and finish them off with q and a basic attack. All of this is done in under 3 seconds. Even check this out:

http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/zed
http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/quinn
http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/malzahar

Quins winrate is above zeds and 1% less then malzahars

replies.body:
I think what the OP is talking about is less about the dueling potential of Quinn but rather the roaming potential that could lead to Quinn getting a successful snowball and dominating the game.

Though personally I don't think I would pick malphite against Quinn. Maybe someone more like Poppy.
